limmen.controllers

Class MediaTypeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • limmen.controllers.MediaTypeController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/resources/mediatypes")
public class MediaTypeController
extends java.lang.Object
    RestController for the resource pointed by the url: /resources/mediatypes*
    Author:
    Kim Hammar on 2016-03-22.
